allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete S3-00 NIRS integration with real-time UI data display

Implemented complete NIRS \(Near-Infrared Spectroscopy\) integration for Nonin X-100M device:

Core implementation:
- NirsProtocolParser: ASCII text protocol with CRC-16 CCITT validation
- Rs232NirsSource: Serial port data source \(57600 baud, 1 Hz sampling\)
- MockNirsSource: Physiological waveform simulation for testing without hardware
- NirsIntegrationShell: Quality flag mapping \(ValidMask â†’ QualityFlag\)

UI integration:
- NirsPanelController: Event-driven data handling with Dispatcher thread sync
- NirsViewModel: 6-channel state management \(4 physical + 2 virtual\)
- Real-time percentage display updating every second
- Fault detection and status indicators

Testing:
- 24 unit tests \(basic + robustness\)
- Protocol parsing, CRC validation, concurrent access
- Frame truncation, format errors, boundary conditions

Documentation:
- 800+ line troubleshooting guide
- ICD protocol specification \(evidence/sources/icd/\)
- Implementation handoff documentation

Fixed critical data flow issue: App.xaml.cs now uses NirsWiring with MockNirsSource instead of empty NirsIntegrationShell, enabling real-time data updates in UI.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
